  • Constructor Details

    • MimickedCursor

      public MimickedCursor(Cursor mimicked, double translateX, double translateY)
      Create new mimicked cursor.
      Parameters:
      mimicked - the cursor being mimicked
      translateX - the X translation from the mimicked cursor to the mimic's position
      translateY - the Y translation from the mimicked cursor to the mimic's position

      Draw a line with this cursor.
      Parameters:
      graphics - the graphics context to draw on
      x - the starting X coordinate of the line
      y - the starting Y coordinate of the line
      dx - the ending X coordinate of the line
      dy - the ending Y coordinate of the line

      Draw this cursor.
      Parameters:
      graphics - the graphics context to draw on
      x - the X coordinate of the rendered cursor
      y - the Y coordinate of the rendered cursor
      dirX - the direction X of the rendered cursor
      dirY - the direction Y of the rendered cursor

    • at

      public static MimickedCursor at(Cursor mimicked, double x, double y)
      Mimic a cursor at the given absolute position.
      Parameters:
      mimicked - the mimicked cursor
      x - the X position of the mimic
      y - the Y position of the mimic
      Returns:
      a new MimickedCursor with mimicked as the cursor being mimicked
